Endobronchial lung volume reduction coil ( LVRC ( ® ) , PneumRx , Mountain View , CA ) treatment recently develop show feasible associate acceptable safety profile , result improvement dyspnea , exercise capacity lung function . The objective study analyze cost effectiveness LVRC treatment severe emphysema . - METHODS : This prospective , multicenter study , randomize 1:1 ratio ( LVRC vs conventional treatment ) include 100 patient follow 1year . The primary outcome measure 6-month improvement 6-minute walk test : percentage patient show improvement least 54m compare group . A cost-effectiveness study estimate cost LVRC treatment , global cost therapeutic option compare cost patient treat LVRC medical treatment alone . - EXPECTED RESULTS : This study allow validate clinical efficacy LVRC severe emphysema . The cost-effectiveness study assess medical-economic impact LVRC therapeutic option .
